DataElement.preferredName: Buccal Mucosa Normal Specimen Receive Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The yes/no indicator response regarding whether buccal mucosa normal specimen was received at a specified location.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: To take, accept, or get something offered._The mucosal membranes located on the inside of the cheek, in the buccal cavity._Being approximately average or within certain limits; conforming with or constituting a norm or standard or level or type or social norm._A part of a thing, or of several things, taken to demonstrate or to determine the character of the whole, e.g. a substance, or portion of material obtained for use in testing, examination, or study; particularly, a preparation of tissue or bodily fluid taken for examination or diagnosis.

Concepts.definition: The mucosal membranes located on the inside of the cheek, in the buccal cavity.
Being approximately average or within certain limits; conforming with or constituting a norm or standard or level or type or social norm.

A part of a thing, or of several things, taken to demonstrate or to determine the character of the whole, e.g. a substance, or portion of material obtained for use in testing, examination, or study; particularly, a preparation of tissue or bodily fluid taken for examination or diagnosis.
To take, accept, or get something offered.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: attributes of a patient's laboratory sample, including the source, condition, and fixative.

Concepts.definition: A response or indicator that can have a value of either yes or no.
